subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Lewis Hamilton overcame an early accident on wet roads at the Monaco Grand Prix on Sunday for a victory that put him at the top of the Formula One standings. Hamilton, a 23-year-old Briton who finished second to his former McLaren teammate Fernando Alonso at Monaco last year, beat BMW Sauber’s Robert Kubica by three seconds. He is the first English driver to win at Monaco since Graham Hill in 1969.
